BeforeInstallPromptEventPrompt.summary:
The prompt() method of the interface allows a developer to show the
install prompt at a time of their own choosing. Typically this will be called in the event handler for the app's custom install UI.

remarks.para: This method must be called in the event handler for a user action (such as a button click) and may only be called once on a given BeforeInstallPromptEvent instance.

-Making PWAs installable
-How to provide your own in-app install experience on web.dev (2021)

BeforeInstallPromptEventPrompt.returns: A resolving to an object containing the following properties:
